fields.label: Search Form Featured Categories
fields.name: header_search_form_featured_categories
fields.instructions: Select a list of categories to appear on initial search form focus.

fields.label: Call to action links to page:
fields.name: header_call_to_action_links_to

fields.label: Show title bar below header?
fields.name: header_show_title_bar
fields.instructions: Can be overwritten through Elementor for each page.

fields.label: On scroll
fields.message: These options are applied when user has scrolled and the header is set to stick to the top of the page.

fields.label: Default Explore Listings page
fields.name: general_explore_listings_page
fields.instructions: This page will be used to display results from the header search form, and to display listings by category.

fields.label: Listings per page
fields.name: general_explore_listings_per_page
fields.instructions: The amount of listings to show at once per search.

fields.label: Default 'Add a Listing' page
fields.name: general_add_listing_page
fields.instructions: This page will be used for actions like relisting expired listings.

fields.label: Default post image
fields.name: blog_default_post_image
fields.instructions: When posts don't have a featured image set, this will be used instead in the blog feed.

fields.label: Custom CSS
fields.name: custom_css
fields.instructions: Add custom styling to your site.

fields.label: Custom Code
fields.name: custom_code
fields.instructions: Use this field for raw HTML/CSS/JS code. It will be outputted in the site footer.

fields.label: General Font Size
fields.name: paragraph_options
fields.css_selector:
body p,
p,
.section-title p,
.featured-section p,
.testimonial-content p,
.showing-filter a:hover p,
.blogpost-section .section-body p

fields.label: Basic Search Form Options ( Home Search Form )
Basic and Advanced Search Form Label Field Options
fields.name: basic-and-advanced-search-form-label-field-options

fields.label: Explore Listing Type Menu Heading Options
fields.name: explore-listing-type-menu-heading-options

fields.label: Call To Action Cover Button Options
fields.name: call-to-action-cover-button-options

fields.label: Listing Menu Options
fields.name: listing-menu-options
fields.css_selector: .profile-header .profile-menu ul li a, .profile-header .profile-menu ul li a.listing-tab-toggle

fields.label: Category / Term Block / Tag Options
fields.name: category-term-block-tag-options
fields.css_selector:
#c27-single-listing .element .pf-body .listing-details li span.category-name,
.block-type-tags .element .social-nav li span,
.block-type-terms .element .social-nav li span
